topic.fullpath: Topic :: Formats and Protocols :: Data Formats :: XML

name: Loaded XML
short_description: A small XML library that uses SAX to parse incoming data and build Java POJO's based on the content. Configuration consists of a single call to map each top-level XML element to a Java POJO. Also, supports basic POJO -> XML serialization.
